/*****************************************************************


				Sensor Description

Sensor map in EC unit

0 1 2
3 4 5
6 7 8


Single EC unit map in Board and Asic

The first number is the Board, the second is the Asic

(b,a)  ,  (b,a+1)
(b+1,a),  (b+1,a+1)

0<=b,a <5


an element (b,a) is an 8x8 sub-matrix

1 is a dead pixel 0 is alive



*******************************************************************/

^ /*you need the symbol '^' to start and end the matrix
